title: Reading with Randos: The Sickness Unto Death (Part 4)
description:
The conversation participants increase to continue reading and thinking their way through Søren Kierkegaard's "The Sickness Unto Death."

Left to right from the top of the thumbnail:
Dr. Jim, Matt,
Julian, Rob, and Josh
